snippet: The Boston Red Sox are sticking to a long-range blueprint for success and relying on 21-year-old shortstop Xander Bogaerts as a critical cog in defense of their World Series crown....

headline.print_headline: World Series Champion Red Sox Relying on Youth
headline.main: World Series Champion Red Sox Relying on Youth

lead_paragraph: The Boston Red Sox are sticking to a long-range blueprint for success and relying on 21-year-old shortstop Xander Bogaerts as a critical cog in defense of their World Series crown.
